creator: tblack@h2st.com
text:
Here is a patch to add PUT as an option for the Http Method in an HTTP Request
Sampler.

The file to be put is specified by using the "Send a File With the Request"
dialogue that is used for POST.  The "Parameter Name" is irrelevant.

Patch to be attached...

Created attachment 15752
Patch to add PUT method as an option in Http Sampler

This patch file was generated using CVS rdiff against a checkout of CVS head on
July 22, 2005, 1pm PDT
creator: tblack@h2st.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the patch.

Similar code has now been added to the 2.1 branch; it will be in release 2.1.2
